banner.title: Towards a Bright Future with Knowledge and Learning
banner.description: Safwat Al Safwa University is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate distinguished students who compete with students from the finest universities. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, scientific research, and training to establish knowledge.

about.title: Safwat Al Safwa University, Excellence in Education and Knowledge
about.description: Safwat Al Safwa University is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate distinguished students who compete with students from the finest universities. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, scientific research, and training to establish knowledge. We provide continuous education for graduates and community members to keep pace with rapid changes and self-development.
about.mission_text: To cultivate and develop good character and self-confidence, and provide high-quality education with practical application to graduate distinguished students. To promote creativity, protect human rights, and exchange knowledge with specialized universities and institutions.
about.vision_text: To provide high-quality education with continuous updating of curricula. To provide an inspiring and innovative educational environment with a focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning. To enhance distance learning and academic integration to prepare future leaders.
about.values_text: Striving for excellence in education, promoting transparency and accountability, and supporting scientific research. Active participation, respecting data privacy, and promoting creative thinking to solve challenges.

benefits.title: Safwat Al Safwa University
benefits.description: We provide our students with a comprehensive educational experience that opens wide horizons for success and excellence in their professional and personal lives. We strive to provide an integrated educational environment that combines academic quality, scientific research, and student activities.
benefits.useful_education_text: We provide useful and productive education and adequate training for success in professional life in a rapidly evolving world
benefits.self_development_text: Self-development through learning critical and creative thinking to solve problems
benefits.international_certificate_text: Obtaining an internationally recognized certificate that opens wide horizons for work and study
benefits.job_opportunities_text: Easy access to job opportunities in the private and public sectors in local and global markets
benefits.community_contribution_text: Effective contribution to community development through qualified graduates
benefits.continuous_education_text: We provide continuous education for graduates and interested community members to keep pace with rapid changes

contact.contact_us_description: We are here to help you with any inquiry or request
contact.subject: Subject

degrees.title: Degrees Awarded by the University
degrees.description: The University Council awards the following degrees based on the recommendation of the College or Institute Council:
degrees.diploma_description: An academic degree that qualifies the student to work in the chosen professional field
degrees.bachelor_description: Bachelor's degree in various academic specializations
degrees.specialization_description: A specialized degree in a specific field after bachelor's
degrees.high_specialization_description: Master's degree in various specializations with research opportunities
degrees.global_specialization_description: The highest academic degree in specialization with advanced scientific research

example_card.welcome_text: Welcome to Safwat Al-Safwa International University, where we strive to provide distinguished education that meets the needs of students in the 21st century.

featured_programs.title: Featured Programs
featured_programs.description: Safwa University offers a range of distinguished academic programs that combine quality, knowledge, and practical skills to prepare future leaders.
featured_programs.computer_science_desc: A program focused on programming, artificial intelligence, and information security to prepare graduates capable of leading digital transformation projects.
featured_programs.business_management_desc: A program that integrates modern theories with practical application to prepare leaders and entrepreneurs capable of competing in the job market.
featured_programs.medical_sciences_desc: An integrated program in basic and clinical medical sciences aimed at preparing a distinguished generation in healthcare fields.
featured_programs.environmental_studies_desc: A program focused on sustainability and finding innovative solutions to global and local environmental challenges.
featured_programs.mechanical_engineering_desc: A program that develops research and design skills in energy, manufacturing, and advanced mechanical technologies.
featured_programs.data_analysis_desc: A practical training program focused on data analysis tools, statistics, and artificial intelligence to prepare qualified personnel for the job market.

history.title: Vision, Mission & Goals
history.description: Safwat Al Safwa University is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate distinguished students who compete with students from the finest universities. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, scientific research, and training to establish knowledge. We provide continuous education for graduates and interested community members to keep pace with rapid changes for self-development and efficiency enhancement.
history.founding_2015: Establishment of Safwat Al Safwa University as one of the leading universities in Saudi Arabia
history.opening_2018: Opening the first specialized colleges and starting bachelor's programs in various specializations
history.graduate_2020: Launching graduate programs, master's, and PhD in various specializations
history.expansion_2023: University expansion and opening new branches and advanced educational programs
history.mission_text: To cultivate and develop good character and self-confidence, and provide high-quality education with practical application to equip students with scientific and practical tools before graduation to produce distinguished students. To promote creativity in finding innovative solutions to current and expected challenges, provide distinguished research that contributes to sustainable development, protect human rights, and enhance knowledge exchange with specialized universities and institutions.
history.vision_text: To provide high-quality education, continuous updating of curricula to match scientific progress, provide continuous education opportunities for graduates and interested community members to keep pace with rapid scientific development and rehabilitation to meet current and future labor market needs, provide an inspiring and innovative educational environment, focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning methods and scientific research to establish knowledge, enhance distance learning to obtain scientific material at the appropriate time and reduce study costs, horizontal and vertical integration of curricula, study by semester system to accommodate different capabilities and abilities of each student, conduct research and practical studies to solve current and expected challenges, graduate highly qualified students with insightful vision in various university specializations to be future leaders, respect others' ideas and beliefs, evaluate practical experiences, contribute to community service, prepare future leaders, support sustainable development, and cooperate with specialized universities and institutions internationally.
history.goals_text: To qualify students to become specialists in their field, support scientific research and innovation in various fields, enhance knowledge and understanding in various scientific fields, and contribute to community development.
history.academic_excellence_text: Striving to achieve excellence in education and promote scientific research
history.community_participation_text: Effective contribution to community development and preparing future leaders
history.innovation_text: Promoting creative thinking to find practical solutions to challenges
history.global_vision_text: Cooperation with specialized universities and institutions internationally

institutes.title: Institutes
institutes.description: We provide specialized educational and training programs that combine science and practical training to acquire practical skills
institutes.arabic_language_description: Dedicated to teaching Arabic to non-native speakers through a comprehensive curriculum and modern teaching methods to develop reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills
institutes.applied_sciences_description: Provides specialized educational and training programs that combine science and practical training to help students acquire practical skills and rehabilitate the unemployed according to market requirements
arabic_goals: Develop reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills
Introduce students to Arabic and Islamic culture and traditions
Use modern and advanced teaching methods
applied_sciences_goals: Provide specialized educational and training programs
Help students acquire required practical skills

mission_goals.title: Mission & Goals
mission_goals.description: We are committed to a clear mission and specific goals to achieve excellence in education and scientific research
mission_items: Provide high-quality education and practical application to equip students with scientific and practical tools
Promote creativity to find innovative solutions to current and expected challenges
Provide distinguished research that contributes to sustainable development
Promote knowledge exchange with specialized universities and institutions
goals_items: Qualify students to become specialists in their fields
Support scientific research and innovation in various fields
Promote knowledge and understanding in various scientific fields
Cooperate with specialized universities and institutions

principles.title: Principles & Values
principles.description: We are committed to a set of principles and values that govern our work and guide our vision towards excellence
principles_items: Promote mutual respect between faculty, students, and staff
values_items: Strive to achieve excellence in education
Promote transparency and accountability in all transactions
Support publication of peer-reviewed scientific research
Promote creative thinking to find practical solutions to present and future challenges

recent_news.title: Recent News
recent_news.description: Follow the latest news, events, and activities at Safwa University
recent_news.anniversary_description: Safwat Al-Safwa University celebrated its 10th anniversary with the presence of senior officials and academics. The celebration witnessed the honoring of outstanding students and distinguished faculty members, in addition to announcing new development projects aimed at enhancing educational and research quality.
recent_news.scholarship_description: The university announced the launch of a comprehensive scholarship program targeting outstanding students from various academic levels. The program covers full tuition fees in addition to a monthly stipend and free study materials for eligible students.
recent_news.lab_description: A group of advanced scientific laboratories was opened in the faculties of medicine, engineering, and sciences, equipped with the latest technologies and scientific equipment to provide an excellent educational and research environment for students and faculty members.

remote_learning.title: Remote Learning
remote_learning.description: Enables students from different geographical areas to learn through modern educational means; providing flexible educational opportunities for everyone at a pace that suits their individual needs
remote_learning.synchronous_description: Interactive live lectures through virtual classrooms via the internet
remote_learning.asynchronous_description: Pre-recorded lectures that allow students to access them at the appropriate time for each student and participate in discussions
remote_learning.benefits_description: Remote learning encourages self-directed and collaborative learning without the need to be present in traditional classrooms
synchronous_features_list: No need to travel to campus
Saves time and reduces study costs
Direct interaction with instructor and colleagues
Ability to ask questions and get immediate answers
asynchronous_features_list: Student studies at their convenient time
Review lectures as needed to enhance understanding
Ability to pause and replay as needed
Saves time and effort in commuting
general_benefits_list: Reduces costs associated with traditional education such as travel and accommodation
Provides flexible educational opportunities for everyone
Enables access to education from anywhere in the world
Provides a comfortable and suitable learning environment

research_center.title: Research and Studies Center
research_center.description: The center has created the first beacon for a better tomorrow for what the individual and society should be to contribute to achieving security, peace, and sustainable development in 246 volumes
research_center.scientific_research_description: The center conducts more research and studies to achieve the university's goals in various scientific and academic fields
research_center.specialized_studies_description: We provide specialized studies in various fields to achieve security, peace, and sustainable development in society
research_center.scientific_publication_description: Publishing research and studies in 246 volumes to be a beacon of science and knowledge in various fields
research_goals_list: Produce distinguished scientific research that contributes to sustainable development
Support researchers and academics in various specializations
Enhance research cooperation with local and international institutions
studies_goals_list: Conduct in-depth studies on societal issues
publication_goals_list: Make research available to researchers and interested parties
Contribute to building a knowledge society

stats.title: University Statistics
stats.description: The university provides a leading educational experience that combines quality, knowledge, and scientific research, with an academic environment that stimulates creativity and innovation to serve society locally and internationally.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We strive to achieve a comprehensive vision that places Safwat Al-Safwa University at the forefront
vision.basic_vision_text: Providing high-quality education with continuous updating of curricula to match scientific progress
vision.continuous_education_text: Providing continuous education opportunities for graduates and interested community members to keep pace with rapid scientific development
vision.educational_environment_text: Providing an inspiring and innovative educational environment with a focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning
vision.distance_learning_text: Enhancing distance learning to obtain scientific material at the appropriate time and reduce study costs
vision.academic_integration_text: Horizontal and vertical integration of curricula with semester-based study system
vision.scientific_research_text: Conducting practical research and studies to solve current and expected challenges
vision.leadership_preparation_text: Graduating highly qualified students with insightful vision in various university specializations
vision.international_cooperation_text: Cooperation with specialized universities and institutions with establishing strong international partnerships

faculty.title: Faculties
faculty.description: Learn about the faculties that provide education at the university

medicine.name: Faculty of Medicine
medicine.description: Aims to provide high-quality medical education, training, and practical experience before graduation for students to become qualified to provide distinguished medical services and take responsibility for their mistakes.
goals: Provide high-quality medical education, training, and practical experience
Support medical research and innovation
Contribute to providing distinguished healthcare

dentistry.name: Faculty of Oral and Dental Medicine
dentistry.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in oral and dental medicine, training, and practical application before graduation for students to become qualified to provide distinguished oral and dental healthcare services.
goals: Provide high-quality education in oral and dental medicine
Support scientific research and innovation in oral and dental medicine
Contribute to providing oral and dental healthcare

medical_sciences.name: Faculty of Medical Sciences
medical_sciences.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in medical sciences fields, training, and practical experience before graduation for students to become distinguished specialists in their medical fields.
goals: Provide high-quality education in medical sciences fields
Support scientific research and innovation in medical sciences
Contribute to providing distinguished healthcare

engineering.name: Faculty of Engineering
engineering.description: Aims to provide high-quality engineering education, training, and practical experience before graduation for students to meet labor market needs.
goals: Provide high-quality engineering education, training, and practical experience
Support scientific research and innovation in engineering fields
Contribute to community development and improving quality of life

management.name: Faculty of Management
management.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in business administration and accounting fields, training, and practical experience before graduation for students in companies and institutions to meet labor market needs.
goals: Provide high-quality education in business administration and accounting fields
Develop leadership, management, and accounting skills among students
Contribute to community development and improving quality of life

law.name: Faculty of Law
law.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in human rights and law fields, training, and practical experience before graduation for students to become qualified to work in the judiciary, as lawyers, or consultants.
goals: Provide high-quality education in human rights and law fields
Develop legal knowledge and deep understanding of laws and regulations
Contribute to achieving justice through applying legal knowledge

humanities.name: Faculty of Humanities
humanities.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in advocacy and media fields, training, and practical experience before graduation for students to qualify them to understand and analyze human and cultural phenomena.
goals: Provide high-quality education in advocacy and media fields
Contribute to community development and improving quality of life

community_development.name: Faculty of Community Development
community_development.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in community development and social work fields, training, and practical experience before graduation for students to qualify them to become specialists in community development and social work.
goals: Provide high-quality education in community development and social work fields
Contribute to community development and improving quality of life

computer_science.name: Faculty of Computer Science and Information Systems
computer_science.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in computer science and information technology fields, training, and practical experience before graduation for students to qualify them to become specialists in software design and development and information systems.
goals: Provide high-quality education in computer science and information technology fields
Qualify students to become specialists in software design and development

languages_translation.name: Faculty of Languages and Translation
languages_translation.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in languages and translation fields, training, and practical experience before graduation to qualify them to become experts in languages and translation.
goals: Provide high-quality education in languages and translation fields
Develop linguistic knowledge and deep understanding of languages and cultures
Contribute to facilitating linguistic communication between different cultures

admissions.main_description: Safwat Al Safwa University is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate distinguished students who compete with students from the finest universities. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, scientific research, and training to establish knowledge.

step1.title: Submit Application
step1.description: Fill out the online application form and submit all required documents through the university website

step2.title: Submit Documents
step2.description: Send all required documents such as academic certificates, ID photos, and personal photos

step3.title: Personal Interview
step3.description: You will be invited for a personal interview with the admissions committee to evaluate your abilities and academic qualifications

step4.title: Receive Decision
step4.description: You will receive notification of the admission or rejection decision via email or text messages

academic_records.title: Academic Records
academic_records.description: High school diploma or equivalent with official transcript

recommendation_letters.title: Recommendation Letters
recommendation_letters.description: Two recommendation letters from previous teachers or academic supervisors

personal_statement.title: Personal Statement
personal_statement.description: Write a personal statement explaining your academic and professional goals and reasons for choosing the university

standardized_tests.title: Standardized Tests
standardized_tests.description: Results of standardized tests or English language tests according to the required specialization

request_info.title: Request Information
request_info.description: Do you have questions about the admission process or available programs? Contact us for more information

campus_visit.title: Campus Visit
campus_visit.description: Learn about the university facilities and distinguished learning environment through a campus visit

ready_to_apply.title: Ready to Apply?
ready_to_apply.description: Start your academic journey with Safwat Al Safwa University and be part of our distinguished community
